thread.title: Prince William hails 'world's true action heroes' at Earthshot awards
thread.title_full: Prince William hails 'world's true action heroes' at Earthshot awards

author: whatfinger
title: Prince William hails 'world's true action heroes' at Earthshot awards
text:
Prince William has praised environmental innovators as the "world’s true action heroes", describing them as the role models we need "in these uncertain times" at his Earthshot awards in Rio.
For the fifth year of his environmental prize, which sees five innovators or entrepreneurs awarded £1m each, he was joined by singers Kylie Minogue and Shawn Mendes performing at the ceremony.
#skynews #uknews #earthshotprize #royalfamily #princewilliam
Read more: https://news.sky.com/story/prince-william-hails-worlds-true-action-heroes-at-earthshot-awards-and-gets-praise-himself-from-kylie-13464709
